page.title: 05Houses in Heol-y-Cyw.
page.content: The houses in our village are mainly{ {semi-detached or terraced.}Around the village the houses are old,{detached } farmhouses and cottages. These mainly date back to the rural community of the last century and before. The{terraced}houses were built at the beginning of the century to house the growing number of miners and their families. The{semi-detached }houses were mainly built by the local council before and since World War 2. A limited amount of private building has also taken place during the last 10 years. Many houses are now owner-occupied and the terraced houses have been extensively renovated. Many have central heating and almost all have bathrooms and indoor toilets. (Group C.) Ph.D.
